about_the_game:
In this casual adult-only club manager game everything revolves around sexuality.

You take on the role of a strip club owner and your task is to revitalize an adult establishment, which admittedly has seen better days. Operate the day to day activity of the place with an easy and casual control, manage food creation and services, the dancers, bartenders and upgrade and customize your club and the girls. In addition to hiring individual strippers and cultivating an interpersonal, and romantic relationship with them, you have to overcome numerous obstacles as well.

  • Flirt with cute anime girls, each with their own personality, and enjoy their final rewards.
  • Manage the roles the girls fulfill and upgrade the costumes they wear in the club.
  • Handle customer orders by fulfilling their requests, from food and beverages to pole and lap dances.
  • Collect and upgrade furniture and club equipment to make your club even more appealing to your customers.
  • Enjoy all the hentai sex scenes.

Features


  • 20+ fully animated and uncensored 3D sex scenes. More coming soon!
  • Light, casual gameplay.
  • Put together the desired food and drinks with just a few clicks.
  • 7 girls unlocked in story mode.
  • Lots and lots of flirt threads to learn about the girls' personalities.
  • The girls have their own roleplay costumes. All of which you can recolor.
  • 3 unique settings: a Strip Club, a Luxury Yacht and a Fancy Casino.
  • 30+ pieces of furniture to upgrade and customize your club.
  • 30+ story and 3 special challenge levels.
  • Enjoy the freedom of 3D sex scenes.

Woop Media is a dedicated developer of adult-only games. Follow us on Steam to get notified about our upcoming releases.

highlighted.name: Put all the money in the bag!

content_descriptors.notes:
The whole game revolve around sexuality e.g.
* the icons and user interface
* the story 
* the characters
* the adult cutscenes

In some scene interactions between 2 or more adults are shown.  The erotic movements and nudity of women are  frequent in the game. In the dialogues the sexuality also there in a mid level.

No violence and drug in the game.
